resource.name: Notes to Accompany Unit #1 Videos
resource.intro:
This provides some additional things related to Unit #1 which you may find useful, especially on the assignments.  Each unit will have a brief document like this.  They will include:

  • Example Getting a Feel problems
  • Lists of additional recommended problems for you to do when you are studying for exams.

If I have time I will add:

  • Sample worked problems
  • An index for the videos (this is a huge project which I don't expect to make much progress on this year)
